## Restock Recommendation

| Rationale                         | Current stock is sufficient to cover forecasted demand for 5 days. Ordering 20,000 units will ensure sufficient inventory for the next 6 days, factoring in a 1-day lead time and potential demand fluctuations. This allows for a safe buffer and avoids potential stockouts. |
